1952100a-730e-4501-a93c-fa81ab647ca3.description: Earners of this badge are able to design, install, configure and operate a software-defined data center with VMware Cloud Foundation to support virtual machines and containers. In addition, badge holders are trained in creating solutions for business requirements around disaster recovery, scalability, performance and security.
1952100a-730e-4501-a93c-fa81ab647ca3.name: VMware Cloud Foundation - Trained Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badgEarners of this badge have successfully completed an intense three week training program that covers the VMware Cloud Foundation (VCF) solution. Week 1 focuses on the core architecture and foundational skills needed to install, configure and manage VCF. Week 2 dives deeper into the configuration and operations of VCF to support advanced use cases like containers, multi-cloud, and security. Week 3 closes out the program by focusing on next generation data center design.

2a5b4c4e-1df1-4bf6-a7ff-b9ea89ee1ce3.description: Earners of this badge are able to design, install, configure and operate a software-defined networking and security architecture to support virtual machines, containers and physical machines. In addition, badge holders are trained in creating solutions for business requirements around disaster recovery, scalability, performance and security.
2a5b4c4e-1df1-4bf6-a7ff-b9ea89ee1ce3.name: VMware NSX - Trained Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have successfully completed an intense three week training program that covers all aspects of the VMware NSX product portfolio.  Week 1 focuses on the core architecture and foundational skills needed to install, configure and manage VMware NSX.  Week 2 dives deeper into the configuration and operations of VMware NSX to support advanced use cases like containers, multi-cloud, and security.  Week 3 closes out the program by focusing on next generation data center design.

041a37a1-3027-46bc-9700-18b09dc4b984.description: Earners of this badge are able to install, configure and manage a VMWare Network Security solution using VMware NSX. Badge holders have been trained to protect applications using distributed firewall, distributed IDS/IPS and advanced threat analysis techniques.
041a37a1-3027-46bc-9700-18b09dc4b984.name: VMware Network Security Trained Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have successfully completed an intense four day training program on network security with VMware NSX.
